trans-unit.source: Represents a converter that converts the dimensions of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref> control into a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje konwerter, który konwertuje wymiary <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"> </xref> sterowania do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush> created by this converter applies an <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OpacityMask%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox> so that it does not appear in the area defined for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>Utworzył konwertera odnosi się <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OpacityMask%2A>do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border>elementu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox>będą wyświetlane w obszarze zdefiniowanym dla <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OpacityMask%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.BorderGapMaskConverter"></xref> class.
Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"></xref> that draws the border for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"> </xref> który rysuje obramowanie <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"> </xref> formantu.

trans-unit.source: The three numbers that are in the `values` parameter represent the following <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox> control parameters: - The width of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> content.
trans-unit.target: Trzy cyfry, które znajdują się w `values` parametr reprezentować następujące <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox>kontrolować parametry:-szerokość <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>zawartości.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration provides a graphical representation of the `values` parameter.
![A GroupBox and the valiues for the Convert method](~/add/media/bordergapmaskconverterillustration.png "A GroupBox and the valiues for the Convert method")
trans-unit.target: ![GroupBox i valiues przez metodę Convert](~/add/media/bordergapmaskconverterillustration.png "A GroupBox i valiues metody konwersji")

trans-unit.source: An array of three numbers that represent the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref> control parameters.
trans-unit.target: Tablica trzech cyfr, które reprezentują <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"> </xref> sterowania parametrami.
Aby uzyskać więcej informacji, zobacz uwagi.

trans-unit.source: The width of the visible line to the left of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Szerokość linii widoczne na lewo od <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>w <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"></xref> that draws the border around a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref> control that includes a gap for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*> content.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"> </xref> który rysuje obramowanie wokół <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"> </xref> formant, który zawiera przerwę dla <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>zawartości.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>
